title: Did Trump Use Notes To Self in Sharpie Pen That Said ‘I Want Nothing’?
subtitle: Some news stories in late 2019 were pretty sensational, so readers naturally questioned surreal-looking notes in the president's clutch.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In talking to journalists, U.S. President Donald Trump used some notes to himself written in Sharpie pen that said, in part, "I want nothing."
